featured.text: After darkness falls in some parts of North America, female fireflies gather on the ground.
As there are a number of species of firefly, the males of each kind flash their own particular signal.
Fireflies, small beetles that live in many warmer parts of the world, use light to attract a mate.
When they are hungry, some female fireflies lure the males of other species to them.

other.text: According to the passage, NEITHER flashlight fish NOR fireflies send out light to _____.
Which of the following statements about fireflies is true? (A) All kinds of fireflies use the same signals.

definition.zh_def: 螢火蟲，一種能發光的小昆蟲，通常在夏季夜間出現。
definition.en_def: A firefly is a small insect that produces light, typically seen at night during the summer.
definition.example: We watched the fireflies dance in the garden as the sun set.
